description: Diamond dependency pattern: Authenticator needs StorageProvider for session persistence, StorageProvider needs Authenticator for access control
error_message: ImportError: cannot import name 'StorageProvider' from partially initialized module 'providers.storage' (most likely due to a circular import)
expected_fix: Use lazy imports (import inside methods) or dependency injection to break the circular dependency
optimal_fix: Move imports inside methods that need them (e.g., move StorageProvider import in Authenticator.__init__ and Authenticator import in StorageProvider.__init__)
